Headline: Acquisitions | Customer Engagement | Retention | Performance Marketing | Social Media Strategist | Growth Marketer | Influencer Marketing | Branding | Direct Marketing | Strategic Alliance | ATL & BTL
Comment:
"Distribution decides the scoreboard." That is the harsh truth every founder needs tattooed on their arm.

The paradox is that product strength is a prerequisite, but distribution strength is the differentiator. A great product might earn you a sale, but a dominant distribution network earns you a moat, a long-term, defensible barrier to entry. In India, where consumers are dispersed and the retail ecosystem is fragmented, mastering those "boring parts" (Tier 2 networks, local inventory movement) is what separates a viral trend from a scalable business. Distribution builds the advantage that lasts.
